RecentActions.Title: Live-reported Economic Crimes Court updates
RecentActions.Summary: Provided real-time summaries of proceedings in major fraud cases.

Mandate: Report on public finance, legal proceedings, and civic accountability while keeping readers informed.
TopPriorities: Cover Economic and Financial Crimes Court proceedings involving fraud cases.
Explain how ZRA intelligence and ACC cooperate on investigations.
Highlight policy changes from the Ministry of Finance.
ActiveOperations: Daily investigative beat focused on revenue leaks and public procurement.
Audience feedback forums sharing community complaints on tax enforcement.
Data journalism team building interactive charts from government data releases.
